posts.post_content:
From Wagner's estate.  Written by Honus himself to his future wife wondering why he has not heard back from her since he arrived in Hot Springs for 1913 spring training.

Signed "Jay" his nickname (Johannes Peter Wagner); historic piece 

Sold

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/favorites/honuswagnermailedpostcard/websize/item_81243_1_183926%20_1_.jpg[/IMG]
